title: How do I send a multimedia message？
answer:
1、Touch Messaging and then touch New message.  
2、Enter a mobile phone number in the To field and touch the composition text box to start entering your message. If you enter more than 3 pages (This is releated to the customization of your service provider) in a text message, the text message is automatically changed to a multimedia message.  
3、Touch > Add subject. If you add a subject to a text message, the text message is automatically changed to a multimedia message.  
4、Touch > Attach to attach pictures, audio files, or videos. If you attach a multimedia file to a text message, the text message is automatically changed to a multimedia message.  
5、Touch Send MMS.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115103024.PNG)

6、Add several subjects as attachment(Slide mode).

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/01-111115103035.PNG)
